Package com.intellij.util.ui

Class JBCachingScalableIcon<T extends JBCachingScalableIcon>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.scale.UserScaleContextSupport
      • com.intellij.util.ui.JBScalableIcon
        • com.intellij.util.ui.JBUI.JBIcon
          • com.intellij.util.ui.JBCachingScalableIcon<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScalableIcon, CopyableIcon, ScaleContextAware, javax.swing.Icon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeferredIconImpl, EmptyIcon, SizedIcon

    public abstract class JBCachingScalableIcon<T extends JBCachingScalableIcon>
extends JBUI.JBIcon
implements CopyableIcon
    A JBScalableIcon providing an immutable caching implementation of the ScalableIcon.scale(float) method.

    • Method Detail

      • scale

        public T scale(float scale)
        Description copied from interface: ScalableIcon
        Creates and returns a scaled instance of the icon. The icon is scaled relative to its origin, that is scale(1f) will return the icon in its original scale. To scale this instance by n times: scale(n * getScale()). Note that the methods Icon.getIconWidth() and Icon.getIconHeight() should return the scaled size of the icon.
        Specified by:
        scale in interface ScalableIcon
        Overrides:
        scale in class JBScalableIcon
        Parameters:
        scale - scale
        Returns:
        a new scaled copy of this icon, or the cached instance of the provided scale

      • copy

        public abstract T copy()
        Description copied from interface: CopyableIcon
        Returns a copy of this icon.

        The copy should be a new instance, it should preserve the original size and should paint equal to the original bitmap. The subtype of the new icon is up to an implementor. It may or may not be equal the original subtype.

        Specified by:
        copy in interface CopyableIcon

      • getScaleContext

        public T getScaleContext()
        Specified by:
        getScaleContext in interface ScaleContextAware
        Returns:
        the scale context

      • updateScaleContext

        public boolean updateScaleContext(UserScaleContext ctx)
        Description copied from interface: ScaleContextAware
        Updates the current context with the state of the provided context. If ctx is null, then updates the current context via ScaleContext.update() and returns the result.
        Specified by:
        updateScaleContext in interface ScaleContextAware
        Parameters:
        ctx - the new scale context
        Returns:
        whether any of the scale factors has been updated
